Module test_ui1
Package test_ui.Components.Component

Class Component

java.lang.Object
test_ui.Components.Component.Component
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbilityController, GameFinish, LiberalBoardController, PlayerPaneController, PopupLayerManager.PopupComponent, SpyBoardController
public class Component extends Object
Designed to simplify the work with components, stores the Parent obj, updates the basic component, provides extra functionality
